name: Very Berry Granola
description: Turn this vegan and gluten free berry granola into tasty bars!
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Watermelon Seeds (Magaj or sunflower seeds)
1/4 teaspoon spices of choice (I added a pinch of cinnamon and ginger)
a few drops of stevia or a Tablespoon of raw sugar powdered (optional, for sweeter)

recipeInstructions.text: Puree a cup of berries of choice, without water and keep aside. I used Blueberries and Strawberries.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree a cup of berries of choice, without water and keep aside. I used Blueberries and Strawberries.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add all the dry ingredients and mix for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add all the dry ingredients and mix for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, heat 1/3 cup berry puree and combine coconut oil, agave, sugar and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: In a saucepan, heat 1/3 cup berry puree and combine coconut oil, agave, sugar and salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat till just about a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat till just about a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this to the dry. Mix well. Add more berry puree if needed.(It depends on the berries and the moisture content.)
recipeInstructions.name: Add this to the dry. Mix well. Add more berry puree if needed.(It depends on the berries and the moisture content.)

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the mixture on parchment lined tray.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the mixture on parchment lined tray.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix it up bit, rotate the baking tray, and bake for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix it up bit, rotate the baking tray, and bake for another 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven, and press lightly with spatula to get the granola to stick.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from oven, and press lightly with spatula to get the granola to stick.

itemListElement.text: Add Oat flour and berry puree to the granola. Add enough puree to wet the granola so it sticks easily.Press the mixture into a pan. Press evenly and well.Bake in preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until dry in the center.
